history.content:
@6127

@Nicole Evans McIntyre   (not CS minor Advisor [also OOO])

Hi all,

I am unclear about when you can submit the declaration form. The new policy states that you should do it when you have 4+ requirements completed and no later than the semester prior to graduation. Does that mean that you can only declare it the semester after you have finished the last prerequisite (e.g. finish the last one Spring 18, declare Fall 18, graduate Spring 19) or can you declare it in the semester during which you are enrolled in the last prerequisite (e.g. declare in Fall 18 while enrolled in last prereq, graduate Spring 19).

Thank you!
history.subject: CS Minor Policy
